Job Details:
- Design and develop the user interface on iOS/ Android platform.
- Analyze user behavior in order to optimize the user interface.
- Produce design deliverables including user flows, sketches at various levels of fidelity, 
wireframes, journey maps.
- Participate and collaborate in concept development and design ideation for new product 
features.
- Here are my portfolio: https://www.behance.net/tuanhuu288
